card.description: This dataset contains every 3-point attempt made during the NCAA 2017 tournament. With this data it's possible to predict whether the shot was made or missed.

context.potentialUses: Predict whether a 3-point shot was made or missed.

fields.description: Abbreviation of the name of the away team.
Abbreviation of the name of the home team.
Time elasped on the game clock, in seconds.
The number of the player who took the shot.
Distance from the left baseline (the line behind a basket)
Distance from the bottom sideline (the line along the length of the court)
Whether the 3-point shot was made or missed.
